item.title: Create temporary environment from Pull Request with ArgoCD ApplicationSet
item.description: Deploying app to Kubernetes. Creating a **new environment for each pull request**.

item.title: ArgoCD Sync Wave + Postgres
item.description: Deploying app to Kubernetes and setup Postgres database using **ArgoCD Sync Wave** in a **Kind** cluster with **Terraform**.

item.title: Microservice + ArgoCD ApplicationSet + Image Updater
item.description: Deploying microservice using **ArgoCD ApplicationSet** and **ArgoCD Image Updater** in a **Kind** cluster with **Terraform**.

item.title: ArgoCD + Image Updater
item.description: Playing with **ArgoCD Image Updater** and **public** and **private repositories**.

item.title: EKS + RDS + PostgreSQL
item.description: Interract with **RDS for PostgreSQL** from an **EKS cluster**.

item.title: EKS + DynamoDB
item.description: Interract with **DynamoDB** from an **EKS cluster** with a **Service Account**.

item.title: EKS + ArgoCD + Multi-Environments and Multi-clusters Gitops
item.description: Deploy **multiple environments** on **multiple EKS clusters** with **ArgoCD**.

item.title: Github Actions + ECR + ECS
item.description: Using **Github actions** to automatically build and push a new docker image on **ECR** and deploy it to **ECS**.
